posts.post_content:
Looking for a good example of this 1904 Montreal Royals RPPC

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=269090&d=1491921533[/IMG]

Come on all you post card guru's. Find this one for me. 

[url]martyisarockstar@hotmail.com[/url]

At first, I thought you were selling this one, and I immediately thought, "HEY!!! I know a guy who is looking...oh."

Nope. :)

[quote name="JoeDfan" post=1808575]At first, I thought you were selling this one, and I immediately thought, "HEY!!! I know a guy who is looking...oh."

Nope. :)[/QUOTE]

My first reaction *every time* Marty bumps one of his threads, is "holy crap...somebody is selling a [.....]." I'm slowly learning to look at the OP's name first, but every now and again he still gets me. This one got me.

One day Marty...one day you'll turn 'em up.

Good luck ;)

Richard.
